document_data.mainbody: '''Generosity domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with generosity-related [[spell]]s and powers. Once a day they could immediately cast a healing spell of the [[conjuration]] type at maximum effect.{{Cite dragon/355/Seven Saintly Domains|26}}
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[deathwatch]]'', ''[[shield other]]'', and ''[[detect thoughts]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[discern lies]]'', ''[[true seeing]]'', and ''[[prying eyes]]''. Those that were masters in this domain had access to ''[[guards and wards]]'', ''[[teleport object]]'', and ''[[foresight]]''.
